title: Portable Software Mix Collection DC 2016.07.31
description:
Portable Software Mix Collection DC 2016.07.31

*** About this release

This collection includes the latest versions of various useful Windows apps.

Most applications were virtualized using the latest version of VMWare Thinapp, which ensures they run on any Windows version (tested on Windows 10 64-bit).
VMWare ThinApp USB versions do not write files nor registry entries to the host computer.
Instead, they deploy all necessary data to a subfolder along the executable.

Automatic updates and internet connections were disabled whenever such options are made available in the program's option (block any internet connection attempt with your firewall).

Applications are registered and/or patched, you will be able to run them from any location (folder, USB drive).
Some applications are system specific (32-bit/64-bit), others will run on both systems.

All files were scanned with ESET Smart Security (updated 2016.07.31)

Usage: unpack to a directory of your choice and launch your favourite application.
Size (all archives unpacked): 1.64 GB

*** Included in this release

Android Phone Management
MOBILedit! Enterprise 8.6.0.20354
MOBILedit! Forensics 8.6.0.20354

Audio
dBpoweramp Music Converter R16 (Illustrate)
EZ CD Audio Converter Ultimate 4.0.4.1
Tag&Rename 3.9.8

Authoring tools
WinCHM Pro 5.124
Rapid CSS 2016 14.1.0.185 (Blumentals)

Boot managers

WinToHDD Enterprise 2.1
WinToUSB Enterprise 3.1

Office tools

Registry tools

Wise Registry Cleaner 9.23

Text editors

Video tools
